meanings.definition: To make something bright or white
meanings.sent1: She used bleach to geal the stained shirt.
meanings.sent2: The painter will geal the walls with a fresh coat of paint.
meanings.sent3: The laundry detergent gealed the dirty socks to perfection.
meanings.sent4: The sun's rays gealed the frost on the grass.
meanings.sent5: The artist will geal the canvas with vibrant colors.

meanings.sent1: She loved the geal of fresh snow on the mountains.
meanings.sent2: The room was painted in a calming geal.
